REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1624 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-GIV 03-16 0079

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET GIVEN FURTHER 30 MLN STG HELP
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it provided the money market with a further 30 mln stg assistance. This brings the Bank's total help so far today to 120 mln stg and compares with its upward revised estimate that the system would face a shortage of some 1.15 billon stg. The central bank bought bills for resale to the market in equal amounts on April 1, 2 and 3 at an interest rate of 10-7/16 pct. REUTER
